column1: 127kph, good length, fourth stump line, he pushes on the front foot working it to mid on
129kph, good length, angled across the left-hander and he lets it go
fuller length, hint of shape away, he drives on the up to mid on
126kph, fuller length, he drives elegantly but straight to cover who is reasonably close
131kph, good length, he walks down the track towards the length and drives stylishly through cover-point, timing it nicely for two
full on leg stump and Khawaja cashes in clipping this beautifully behind square with superb timing and it races away
129kph, full outside off, he drives neatly to cover and a misfield allows for two. That was a bad miss from Umar Akmal
back of a length outside off, he defends off the back foot
fuller outside off, he drives on the up firmly to mid off
135kph, back of a length, he tries to whip off the hip, gets a thick inside edge onto thigh pad and it runs fine of third man, they run well to get two
back of a length outside off, he hangs back and punches this to mid off
131kph, good length top of off, he stands tall in the crease and punches firmly back to the bowler
128kph, good length, fourth stump line, he checks his drive pushing this to cover-point
127kph, wider of off, he reaches out and drives but mistimes it to mid off
good length, off stump, he clips this neatly but straight to mid on
he walks down the track to a good length ball and whips this with fast hands working it forward of square, fine leg had to run a long way around to cut it off but they get three
128kph, fuller length wide of off, he drives firmly but straight to mid off
126kph, good length, he defends towards mid off and takes off for a quick single, he judged it well as it just got past Umar Akmal racing in from cover
back of a length, outside off, he punches firmly off the back foot to cover, again Akmal misfields and allows one
134kph, short and wide, he hammers a cut shot and Shan Masood makes a great diving save to his right to knock it down but he can't prevent one
135kph, back of a length, he hangs back and tries to hammer this down the ground but gets a thick inside edge into the thigh pad
133kph, good length outside off, he drives on the up to mid off
top edge flies over the keeper! This was a 135kph, bouncer, it surprised him for bounce and pace, he tried to pull and got a top edge straight over the keeper's head! Well bowled. Deserved better
back of a length, he hangs back and punches to mid off
good length angled into off, he drives on the up to mid on
short and angled well down the leg side and called wide
flicks a pull shot wide of fine leg! This was not that short but but he just flicked a pull shot with brilliant timing behind square. Excellent shot
good length, off stump, he whips this with the bottom hand through forward square for two more
good length, he cracks a drive on the rise to cover
thick outside edge flies to fine third man! No slip in. He got a big stride in and drove really hard on the up at a wide delivery and the thick edge flies away to third man
shorter length, cramped for room, he tries to whip behind square but it taken on the thigh pad
134kph, shorter length on leg, he hangs back and punches this straight to midwicket
shorter length, he punches off the back foot slowly to mid off and runs with the stroke, the man is deep on the circle and they get through easily
whipped away magnificently through midwicket! This was sumptuous. Too full and straight and with those magic wrists he clipped it firmly through the gap. Lovely shot.

opens the face and runs this to fine third man! Excellent batting. It was a good length well wide of  off, he waited, opened the face and ran it along the ground past the floating slip with control and third man is too wide to cut it off
back of a length, fourth stump line, he's back and whipping this forward of square, again finding the gap for three more
leading edge lands safely well short of cover. It was an off cutter slower ball on leg, he tried to close the face and work it through midwicket, gets a leading edge but gets away with it
full and way wide of off at 123kph, it's wide of the guideline and called
good length outside off, he drives mistiming it back to the bowler, Abbas swivels and throws back at the striker's and hits Khawaja on the pad. It's all fine though. Abbas apologises straight away
full on leg, 129kph, he clips this easily to fine leg for one
launched over long on! What a strike! It was a length ball and he took one stride down and lifted this powerfully through the line over the sight screen! Magnificent from Finch
fuller outside off, he drives firmly but can't beat cover
full outside off, he smokes a drive as hard as he can straight to mid off
130kph, good length on odd, he pushes this with soft hands forward of point and they run well to get one
darted into off, he is forward and defending
skips down but is beaten in flight and taken on the pad
shorter length, 94kph, he's back and punching to mid off
shorter again, he drives off the back foot but can't beat point
flatter and straighter on middle, he punches back to the bowler
drifting into leg, he is back and trying to work it square but gets a leading edge
good length, 138kph, angled into off, he defends from the crease pushing to cover
fuller, 139kph, on off, he drives mistiming this to mid off
139kph, good length angled into off, he whips this towards midwicket but can't find the middle of the bat
short and wider, 139kph, he sits back and late cuts nicely to third man
good length, fifth stump line, he sits back and runs this to third man with ease
back of a length, he's back and punching this to mid off
drifting into leg stump, he turns this towards square leg off the front pad
darted into leg stump, he paddle sweeps to short fine
darted into middle, he drives back to the bowler
fuller outside off, he drags a drive to long on across the line
shorter length, he's back and punching this to long on
beaten trying to run this down to third man as it slid across him
full, 143kph, into middle and off, he pushes this slowly to mid on and calls immediately for one
good length wide of off, he runs this neatly down to third man
good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot
142kph, shorter length angled into leg, it comes off the thigh pad and bounces away for a leg vye
short and wide and beats him for pace as he tries to flash a cut shot
136kph, back of a length outside off, he's up on his toes and punching nicely to deep cover-point
fuller on off, he drives back to the bowler
full on leg, he's down early and paddle sweeping this fine, there's a man back so they only get two
play and miss trying to cut a ball that skidded on low wide of off
delightful late cut fine of short third man! It was the same delivery but he didn't try and lace it, he just used the pace and ran it fine of short third man and it raced away
shorter length, he stands up and punches hard off the back foot to deep cover-point
drifting into leg, he glances this fine but straight to the man on the circle at short fine
back of a length, it skids on as he tries to pull, it hits the back thigh pad and rolls to gully
fuller outside off, he drives flowingly but straight to mid off
137kph, short but not that wide, he leans back trying to cut hard but chops a bottom edge into the off side
well directed short ball pulled fine! Cleverly done by Khawaja. It was well directed but he got inside the line, rolled the wrists and pulled it fine for four
134kph, back of a length outside off, he is back and whipping this to mid on
132kph, short and wide of off, he is up on his toes getting on top of the bounce and punching it to deep cover-point
tossed up outside off, he waits and drives firmly straight to mid off
looped up on off, he caresses this with the bottom hand working it to long on
darted into leg stump, it comes off the front pad and runs to square leg for a leg bye
tossed up on middle, he works this through forward square to bring up his 50
fuller on middle, he drives firmly to mid on
tossed up outside off, he drives neatly to wide long off
86kph, leg break, drifting into leg, he tucks this behind square and immediately calls two. Well placed
he charges down the track and mistimes this dragging it to midwicket. He wanted a piece of that
he's back to a slider and defending
jumps down early, nowhere near the pitch and is taken on the pad
shorter on leg stump, he's back and working this behind square for a single
leg break on middle and leg, he works this straight to midwicket
a pick up flick over midwicket and into the stands! Amazing shot! It drifted into his arc, he got a good stride in and flicked it with the angle up and over deep midwicket
drifting into leg quicker, he whips this along the ground through square leg
backs away, this is shorter, he tries to cut and misses and it is not far from off stump
good length outside off, he sits back and knocks this to the gap at point
shorter length, outside off, he stands tall and punches off the back foot to long off
darted down leg, he tries to paddle sweep fine and is hit on the pad but it's outside the line
shorter leg break, 84kph, he sits back and knocks this down the ground to long on
skips down and lifts this with the spin over midwicket! Superb footwork, hitting with the spin with control over midwicket for four!
slower leg break, he works this forward of square and they pinch a tight one, Shan has a chance but Finch just beats the throw
91kph, leg break fired down leg, he misses the sweep but called wide
89kph leg break on off, he defends on the front foot
he flicks this in the air over wide long on, Amir is on as a sub, he gets there on the bounce and knocks it down to save a boundary but he has hurt himself
Finch comes forward to drive down the ground, retaining the strike
Finch stands tall and thumps through extra cover, hitting it on the up and all the way to the cover boundary to raise the team hundred
Imad corrects and aims fuller, Finch clipping him through square leg for a single
whipped off the pads for one more
pushed into space at cover, and as Finch wanders out looking for a run a sharp throw comes in, sending him scurrying (safely) home
pushed down the ground for a single
clipped firmly into the leg side, but there's protection at the deep midwicket boundary
just a shade short, outside off, and Khawaja collects one more with a back foot punch
deep cover is brought into the circle, encouraging a drive, but Finch is wise to the plan, picking the googly and opting instead for a single down the ground
reverse sweep, and it doesn't have the beating of short third man but there's room for a quick single
pushed down to long on for one more
milked in front of square on the leg side, and Australia keep ticking
flatter and quicker at almost 95km/h, and Finch can't quite thread it through cover
glanced quite fine towards short fine leg, just the one
Imad aims straight, giving Finch nothing to work with, and the ball is pushed back to the bowler
just too full, and Finch drives to long on
pitched full, with the drift taking it wide of off and prompting an airy slash through point from Khawaja. No fielder there, so a single is the result
Finch works across his pad to find a single through square leg
whipped through square leg, easy as you like, and they amble through for one more
Yasir gets his length slightly off and it's just a bit short, Khawaja hopping back and thumping a pull in the air and right in the gap on the leg side
good follow-up from Khawaja, turning the strike over with a single after the big shot
punched firmly, but straight at the cover fielder
pushed to mid off, where the fielder is up

Imad drifts down the leg side and Finch helps the ball on its way, very fine on the leg side. It's hunted down close to the rope, but they're back for a third and Finch has his fourth fifty-plus score of the series
worked into the leg side for one more
some width to start, and it's chopped through point
there's a speculative appeal as Shinwari bustles in and angles one in from around the stumps, hitting Finch on the front pad, but it's clearly headed down the leg side
straighter this time, and Finch can only push it back to him
Finch whips his hands through a length delivery, inside edging it into the leg side
just short of a length, and Finch hops to glance off his hip to fine leg
Khawaja aims for another cut through point, but he can't beat the field and Shinwari's comeback over is a good one
legbreak, and Finch can't find the gap at cover. He's audibly annoyed at himself for missing out on the width
Finch is down the track this time, driving through mid off for a single
for the umpteenth time, Khawaja milks a single off his legs into the leg side
Finch's turn to work the ball into the leg side this time, turning the strike back over as Yasir strays too straight
very full and nicely straight, Khawaja driving it back to the bowler
full, outside off, and it's driven out to the cover sweeper
hurled down the leg side, and he'll have to bowl that one again
flicked off the straight and into the leg side for a single

bowled off his pads! Shinwari steams in and angles a length ball in to Finch, who swipes at it from the crease. But the angle, and a little seam movement, means ball beats bat, ricocheting off the pads and into the stumps
Shinwari hits a splice-jarring length outside off, Marsh fending from the crease
fuller this time, in the channel around off stump at 142km/h, and it's defended to point
Shinwari maintains a testing line, aiming for off stump, and Marsh is forward to defend
fuller still at 140.8km/h, and it's dug out back to the bowler
very full, on off stump, and Marsh can't get it past mid off. He wants a single, but he's sent back - and wisely so
width offered, and Shinwari fumbles his stop at backward point to allow Marsh to get off the mark with a cut
nicely flighted, and Yasir fields off his own bowling as it's pushed back to him
whipped off the pads and down to fine leg
placed into the gap at point, and they amble through for another
Shinwari offers a spot of width outside off and an angled blade brings a single to third man
full, and inviting the drive outside off, but it's stopped at cover
that's a better line from Shinwari, threatening the stumps. Marsh hurries to keep it out
Shinwari aims full again, and this time Marsh seizes on it to thread a neat little drive through the gap and away to the cover boundary
straighter, and he's worked into the leg side for a single
nice finish to the over, on a length and aimed at the top of off, Khawaja pushing it to cover
floated up on off stump, and it's placed through point
just short of Haris at midwicket! Khawaja is too early into his nurdle to leg, but the ball dips and bounces just in front of the fielder
beaten outside off! Pushed through by Yasir, and the ball goes on straight to beat Marsh's defensive poke
driven down to long on for one
this isn't all that short, but Khawaja reads the length early, hopping back to pull to deep midwicket
nudged down close in on the leg side, and a quick single brings up the 150
and that's a good start from him, hitting a length in the channel to keep Marsh honest
slightly wider outside off, but a firm back foot punch is intercepted at point

thumped down the ground, a powerful drive straight down the ground. And Junaid isn't happy, he seems to have hurt his fingers trying to stop the ball. A stinging blow, and it's to his left hand. But he's good to continue
nicely straight, and this one isn't quite there to drive, Marsh instead defending into the leg side as the ball tails gently in to him
dead-batted to cover point, and they rush through for a chancy single. A direct hit might have been interesting
worked through square leg, one more
nudged into the leg side, with the spin, to turn the strike over
Marsh works with the spin, into the leg side, but a diving midwicket fielder stops the run
and now it's Yasir's turn to dive, tumbling to his left to stop a Marsh drive
full, straight and it's pushed back to the bowler
Marsh comes forward, defending to cover
turned defensively into the leg side, another dot
crunched out through cover, the sweeper keeping them to one
angled down to third man for one more
beaten outside off, Khawaja poking at the ball from the crease with little to no foot movement
he's forward this time to drive, but he can't beat cover
Khawaja looks to be proactive, swiping a length ball into the leg side, and Pakistan's poor day in the field continues as Yasir lets the ball through his legs at mid on to allow runs
short, and it's pulled quite hard but midwicket does a rather better job of stopping the shot than Yasir
punched down to long on, off the back foot
flicked with the spin into the leg side
Marsh uses his feet to get to the pitch, driving hard and Abbas stopping the shot at deep mid off
nurdled behind square for one more
nicely done by Marsh, lunging forward and placing the ball into the gap in front of point
flicked off the toes, into the leg side
driven on the up and out to the cover sweeper
full once more, and it's pushed to mid on
a touch too straight from Junaid, and Marsh works him through square leg
on a length and shaping in to him at 135km/h, Khawaja pushing it back to the bowler
surprise bouncer! Khawaja was walking down at the bowler, but Junaid sends him ducking for cover with a short one
flicked into a gap on the on side, down to long leg for a couple more
he starts full, just outside off at 127km/h, and a drive is stopped in the covers
Marsh pokes flat-footed from the crease, the ball coming off the inside half and rolling into space on the leg side
Khawaja whips his hands through a drive, on the up, but can't time or place it as he'd like
Abbas lobs down a slower cutter, just outside off, and Khawaja can't get this one past cover either
beaten on the inside edge! Abbas hits a length and Khawaja flicks past it, the ball not carrying to Rizwan. Was there an edge? There was definitely a sound
tapped straight to cover once more to end the over
whipped into the leg side
hurled too far down the leg side, and that's wide
Marsh drives powerfully down the ground to long on

in the air, but safe! Khawaja was far too early into his legside flick, popping it tamely up into the air. Yasir made ground from midwicket and put in a dive, but he just couldn't get his fingers underneath it
booming drive, but the ball spins in to beat the bat, the stumps and the keeper
attempted reverse sweep from Khawaja, but it's a tired-looking one and he can't lay bat to ball
Abbas stays around the stumps to the left-handers, but this one is angled too far down the leg side
glanced fine on the leg side, once again Abbas' line was drifting down the leg side and Marsh just needed to lay bat on this one
that's a better line, just outside off, and it's pushed to point where Shan Masood pulls off a diving stop
Marsh angles his bat to get this one a little finer of Shan at point, and again it's stopped with a dive, but not quite cleanly enough to stop the single
slugged to midwicket! Khawaja is into the 90s with a mow into the leg side off a length delivery. Plenty of bottom hand, and excellent timing
a flicked drive sends the ball bouncing down to long on for one more
slower cutter at just more than 104km/h, but it's read and pushed to cover for a single
skips out and launches him down the ground! Sensational strike
darted in and he drops the bat on it in defence
drives firmly to long on
he works this from middle and leg through forward square
skidding through, he defends from the crease
fuller and he drives firmly to long on
short and wide and he cuts nicely past backward point, well placed and timed, the man runs around to keep it to two
fired down leg and rightly called wide
129kph, good length, he tries to drive on the up but mistimes it dragging it to midwicket
short and wide and cut firmly through point for two more
good length, off stump, he pushes this on the up to mid off for a single
104kph, slower ball, he drives inside out but can't beat cover
slower ball again, he drives flowingly down to long on
angled from wide of the crease to middle, he tucks this with the angle through square leg
shorter length, he's back and punching this down to long on
very full outside off, he dead bats this defending to point
flatter on off, he's back turning this to midwicket
quicker outside off, he is back trying to whip, he misses, it comes off pad and rolls away for a leg bye
too much width and he thrashes a square drive through point! Great timing to get the hands through it and pick the gap. It had so much power the sweeper stood no chance
he strides out and drives on the up wide of cover but only gets one
good length, squares him up, he gets a thick outside edge that runs wide of backward point and they get two. 50 for Marsh
124kph, fuller wide of off, he drives firmly but straight to cover
130kph, good length, cramping him on leg, he tucks this to midwicket
slower ball, on middle, he can't do much other than just defend as it holds up in the surface
good length angled down leg, it comes off the thigh pad and Rizwan makes an excellent diving save to prevent extras
good length, outside off, he drives on the up but picks out cover
134kph, fuller outside off, he drives but straight to mid off

caught at midwicket! The pressure got him! It was a good length, on off, he tried to whip it to the leg side but it held up in the surface, he chipped a leading edge straight to midwicket and presented a simple catch for Yasir

should have been caught at fine leg! It was angled down leg from around the wicket, he flicked it in the air off his pads, the man was too far in off the rope at fine leg, it went over his head but landed inside the rope, one bounce four!
fuller outside off, he slices this inside out past backward point for a couple wide of third man
bouncer, 135kph, well directed, he ducks under it well
short and wide, he cuts hard to deep cover-point
short and hammered over midwicket! Drag down leg break and Maxwell is back in a flash and smacking this over midwicket into the huge gap

another short ball, he's back and pulling squarer this time along the ground, Saad Ali runs around on the rope but his knee digs as he slides and he bounces over the ball! It rolls to the rope for four more!
leg break slid down the leg side and called wide
short outside off, he cracks a cut and Shan Masood makes a good stop at point
short outside off, he cracks this cut past Shan for four! Brilliant placement. The power is incredible to beat the sweeper on the rope
fuller length, he sits back and punches down to long off
141kph, length ball down leg, he tried the pick up flick again but it comes off the thigh guard and runs away for a leg bye
play and miss trying to square drive a length ball that skids past the edge at 140kph
short ball, he plays the pull shot but miscues it dragging it to long on
140kph, yorker, brilliantly bowled. He tried to back away and was forced just to jam it out as it was a perfectly executed yorker on middle
short ball, gets big on Maxwell as he tried to step inside the line and pull over midwicket. It got on him quickly as he miscued to the man in the circle
full toss and he angles the blade and slices this with supreme timing past backward point and it races away! Amazing skills from Maxwell
good length, he tries to drive but mistimes to cover and they get one
full toss on leg, he whips this behind square, doesn't time it but picks the gap for two
he skips down and stays leg side, but Abbas bowls a good slower ball, back of a length to beat him as he swung hard
reverse paddle sweep but picks out short third man! Maxwell is furious! It was the yorker as he predicted, played the reverse paddle perfectly but straight to the man for a single
slower ball wide of off, he hammers this on the up through cover-point
short slower ball, he has to sit back and wait and crack a pull shot to deep midwicket
full, attempted yorker is fired down leg and called wide
top edge over the keeper's head! Good bouncer unrewarded. It was high and wide of off, he pulled hard but got a top edge that went up and over Rizwan and away for four more
a check drive for six straight of long on! Unreal! It was a full toss. He just punched a short arm jab and held the follow through, it flew for six straight of long on!
slower ball bouncer, wide of off, he backs away too far and misses
slower ball back of a length, he miscues this punching it on the bounce to mid off
another slower ball, he sets himself with a wide base but miscues dragging it along the ground to deep midwicket
slower bouncer, he waits and pulls off the top edge, it flies high and just wide of short fine leg running to high right, they run well to get two
flat batted over long on! Incredible strength, it was banged in shorter, he comes at the bowler and flat bats it hard and just clears long on!
fuller length, he drives down to long off
full toss outside off, he tries to hammer this through point but misses
crunched inside out over cover! This was in the slot, he cleared the left leg and lasered this over cover! That was well struck
129kph, yorker, fired into leg stump, he jams it out to the bowler. Well bowled
full into leg stump, he drives firmly to long on
full toss fired way down the leg side. Attempted yorker went horribly wrong there

caught at mid off! What a diving catch by Abid Ali! But he's hurt his shoulder! It was a short ball banged in, it bounced very high, Marsh tried to flat bat it down the ground, it balloons off the splice and flies straight of mid on, Abid sprints to his left and dives full length to take a spectacular catch
short ball, whacked over square leg for four! Too easy. This just sat up, he was back and waiting for it, he didn't time it but got enough of it to get to the rope
yorker outside off, he just digs this out back to the bowler, Junaid fields well in his follow through and fires at the striker's to ensure Maxwell has to scamper back
short ball, hooked over short fine leg! He steps inside the line and hooks this off the top edge up and over short fine. 53 off 26 balls for Maxwell!
full on off, he sits back and punches this hard with the bottom hand down to long on on the bounce
back of a length, he stands tall and jabs this towards mid off
tossed up on off, he's back and defending back to the bowler
punched down to long on
switch hit behind point! He set up early for the switch hit, it was shorter length, he waited and roped it between point and short third man!
he gives room and hammers this to long off
shorter length, he's back and crunching this to long off
shorter length, he backs away and flat bats this high to long off and it carries all the way! He didn't nail it but such is the power he can clear the fence off the back foot over long off
good length wide of off, he sits back and runs this to third man with control
full and wide of off, he opens the face and slices this through backward point but there is a sweeper on the rope
beats the inside edge and just misses off stump! This was 137kph, angled in from around the wicket, he sat back and was beaten through the gate but it missed the stumps

Bowled him! Didn't miss this time! Again he sits back deep in his crease, this is fires into to a good length from around the wicket, he leaves a gaping hole between bat and pad trying to punch it down the down the ground, gets a thin edge onto leg stump!
cuts this behind point! What a shot! It was back of a length but tight to off, he leans back to create room and place this magnificently wide of third man!
139kph, good length angled into middle and off, he sits back and chops this into the off side
thigh high full toss, he tried to smoke it over midwicket but he miscued dragging it to long on
reverse lap for four! Ridiculous skill! It was an attempted yorker, across the right hander, he angled the bat and reverse lapped it fine of short third man and he can't stop it!

Bowled him! Off stump sent flying! He tried the conventional ramp, but moved too far inside the line, Junaid fired full and straight and beat him for pace, it cannoned into off stump and sent it cartwheeling
134kph, good length, tailing in, cramping him for room, he punches it back to the bowler
full toss fired way down the leg side and Rizwan stands no chance of stopping it! Five wides. An attempted leg stump yorker gone horribly wrong

LBW! Carey reviews . It was a good length, tailing in towards off, he tried to paddle it fine, it missed the bat and hit the pad infront of off stump. Michael Gough gave it out straight away. Ball tracking says it's hitting leg stump flush! It's out
full on leg stump, he whips this well behind square wide of fine leg for a couple
full yorker, he backs away and gets an inside edge that runs past lag stump and just past the diving Rizwan, they run well for two

LBW! This looked plumb! He shuffled down a step and tried to swing a full ball over the leg side, he missed and was hit on the back leg infront of off stump. Fairly straight forward decision for the umpire. No review for Australia in any case
full angled down leg, he glances this fine! Nice stroke. It was too straight from around the wicket, Richardson glanced this neatly to fine leg
back of a length outside off, he swings hard, gets a thick inside edge that runs down to fine leg
full and straight, he swings hard and gets a thick inside edge that flies behind square wide of fine leg and they sprint back for two
140kph, full inswinging yorker, he pushes this out through cover-point, they run really well to get two
on a length, and shaping back in to the left hander, who defends down the track
and Shan's away with a flick off his pads, the ball rolling through square leg

a century on debut, a golden duck in the next innings! Behrendorff angled this right across Abid, who poked at it from the crease. He might have left it alone, and had to thrust his hands out trying to get to the ball, but he could only feather an edge through to the keeper. Australia strike early
angled in to Haris, who defends to cover
on a length, and it's clipped into the leg side, pinging the fielder at midwicket
in the channel, just outside off, and Haris taps this one defensively to cover
Richardson starts very full, searching for whatever swing might be on offer, and Shan flicks it off his toes out to the man at deep square
Richardson switches to round the stumps to Haris, who pushes a length delivery watchfully to mid on
Richardson keeps it tight on off stump, Haris defending from the crease
slightly fuller, and Haris is drawn into a drive that is stopped at cover
just too straight from Richardson, and the angle from around the stumps takes this down the leg side
that's better, angling in to the channel outside off to test Haris' defence
straighter, and it's tucked softly into the leg side, mid on fielding cleanly
too straight from Behrendorff, but Khawaja does well at short fine leg to save runs, diving to stop Shan's glance
sliced up and over mid off, the ball looping high over the fielder and then plugging in the outfield as they scoot back for the second. The intent was there, but not the execution
another sliced drive, but this one flies down through the gully region, bouncing to third man
elegantly done by Shan, leaning over a full one to clip a brace through midwicket
and now through the off side, Shan driving smartly on the up and in the gap. Lyon chases it down with a slide near the boundary rope
full and straight, and it's pushed firmly back to the bowler
Richardson stays around the stumps and keeps it full, but there's not much in the way of swing. Haris' drive goes straight to cover
and now straight over cover! Haris steps half forward and lifts a full length delivery deliberately up and over the cover infield
angled down, wide of third man, and they rush back for a second
Richardson pulls his length back to negate Haris' driving, and it's prodded defensively to point
chopped down to third man, just the one
Shan looks for a similar shot, but he can't get it fine of backward point
nicely bowled, just short of a good length with a wobbling seam, the ball nipping away from the left hander to beat his outside edge
outside off, and it's sliced down to third man for one more
Shan punches off the back foot, threading the gap behind point. Third man hares around the boundary to keep them to two
Behrendorff aims straighter and Shan's glance is stopped at midwicket
Behrendorff finds a bit of nip in to him off the seam, but Shan is forward and covers it well, and follows that up by an immediate call for a quick single
sweetly driven, but a dive from Handscomb in the covers saves runs
Shan uses Richardson's angle from around the stumps to collect two more through the gap at midwicket

pad first? The umpire doesn't think so, and Australia don't review. Shan was waiting on a late dab, but the ball angled in to cramp him for room. It was also high, so even if it was pad first it wouldn't have been out
on a length, just outside off, and it's pressed firmly to cover. There's just enough room for a quick single
cracked through point! Too short from Richardson, and too wide. Shan had some work to do to get on top of the bounce, jumping up to cut hard down on the ball, beating point
fuller, straighter, and it's pushed back to the bowler
Shan hops again, this time to work a single to midwicket
punched to cover, on the up but not into the gap
another drive from Shan as Behrendorff offers a hint of width, but he finds the field
full, and it's spanked back at Behrendorff, who stops it in his follow through
beautifully timed by Shan, who is once again offered width outside off. He let the ball come on to the bat, but had to place it just right to beat point's right and third man's left. He did both
straighter this time, and it's driven to mid on
Shan steps into a punchy little drive, but picks out mid off
slightly short on middle and off, and it's fetched into the leg side for a single
punched off the back foot, but straight to cover
worked into the gap towards midwicket, just the one
Haris advances, pushing to cover with bat and pad together. There's an appeal, the thinking possibly being that it hit pad first, but he's miles down the track
nudged into the leg side for one
Haris waits, deep in the crease, and follows Shan by nudging a single into the leg side
swatted over long on! Haris knows what to expect from Behrendorff and just sets himself at the crease to power a length delivery back over the bowler, and over the boundary
tucked to Finch at midwicket, who dives to stop it but then throws unnecessarily at the stumps and they find a single off a sloppy throw
chopped down into the off side for one
past a diving short third man! Haris knows the fielder is up, and angles his bat at the very last moment to get it fine of the man at short third man, collecting a boundary
fuller, straighter, and he drives down to long on
driven on the up, but straight to mid off
punched firmly off the back foot, but Stoinis gets around from mid off and dives to keep them to one. It was a boundary if it passed him
Shan backs away, looking to make room, but his shot finds cover
whipped into the leg side, deep midwicket keeping them to one. Lyon's not pitching too many up so far in this spell
Haris jumps down the track again, thrusting his leg at the ball to pad it away. There's an appeal from Lyon, but it's unconvincing
Haris uses his feet again, driving to cover
swatted off the back foot, but again he finds the cover fielder
he comes over the stumps to Shan and digs this one in, the left hander swiveling into a controlled pull and sprinting through for two
Richardson hits a length, but it's straight enough for Shan to work him through square leg
Haris pokes at a length delivery outside off, playing and missing
slapped, on the up, to point
edged, and past the wicketkeeper! Had there been a first slip in place, this would have landed in his lap. Perfect length from Richardson, Haris prodding at the ball as it angled across him
cut out to deep point, off the back foot
another back foot punch, and the sweeper out on the cover boundary has more work to do
Lyon floats this one a little fuller, Haris pressing forward to defend
Haris uses his feet to get close to it, driving down to long off
angling in to him from around the stumps, and Shan works him through midwicket yet again
glanced off the pads, Richardson trotting around from short fine leg to keep them to one
Haris stays deep in the crease, forcing to mid off
Haris comes forward and angles the bat face to send the ball bouncing down to third man
slapped through backward point! This wasn't all that wide, but Haris made the most of what width there was, keeping his right elbow high to maintain control through the stroke
Richardson aims this one straighter, and he's worked into the leg side
appeal for lbw, but the umpire is not interested and Australia don't review it. It might have pitched outside leg
shorter, and Haris hops to glance it off his ribs and down to fine leg
floated up outside off at 84km/h, and it's pushed watchfully to cover
full and Shan drives to long off. Ah, and the throw isn't a great one, arriving at Carey on the bounce. He can't stop it cleanly, and there's overthrows
pushed through fuller, and flatter at 89km/h. It's dead-batted into the leg side, and they pinch a quick single
full, straight and it's pushed back to the bowler
Shan dances out to meet it on the full, slashing a drive out to the sweeper
the offspinner offers a little width outside off, but the cut is stopped at point
chopped down through gully
Haris waits in the crease, forcing the ball to point
sliced through the field! Wonderful piece of timing from Haris, forcing off the back foot, and the placement is just right too, the boundary bringing up his fifty
flighted on middle and leg, and he's down the track to push it back to the bowler
and again! Haris spots some width and thrashes a cut past a diving point fielder for the second boundary of the over
nudged into the leg side, but it's stopped by a diving midwicket fielder
this one rushes straight on with the arm, the ball coming off the inside half of the bat and rolling to midwicket
he's on the drive to collect a single to long on
worked into the leg side, and another committed dive from Richardson at midwicket saves the run
a hurried jab keeps the ball away from the stumps
fuller this time, and it's tapped softly to point
too short, and it's punished! Shan waiting to slash his cut at the very last moment, taking it almost out of the keeper's gloves and fine of short third man
fuller, and he's eased down to long off for one
Haris jumps down the track, and a checked punch finds a gap at cover
Shan flicks across his pads, sending the ball bouncing through midwicket to raise the hundred
and Haris follows suit, working him through midwicket for one more
punched out to the cover sweeper, off the back foot
Shan goes deep into the crease, using Maxwell's angle from around the stumps to collect a single into the leg side
pushed smoothly back to the bowler
chopped down behind square, but he can't beat short third man
pushed towards mid on, Maxwell fielding smartly off his own bowling
chipped in the air, but landing safely in space around mid on
pushed down the ground, one more
and he's greeted with a reverse sweep, the ball rolling out towards the boundary before being stopped by the cover sweeper
worked into the leg side, with the spin, Shan Masood raising a maiden ODI fifty
flighted up nice and high on middle and leg, Haris driving to long on
flicked off the toes, but he can't beat square leg

huge appeal, and it's given! Shan had hopped back, looking to pull, but this wasn't short enough for the shot. The ball skids on to hit him on the back leg as he swipes over the top of it. He asks his partner, and they decide a review isn't worth it. Zampa strikes on his birthday!
a leg break, that turns a touch wide of off, he pushes at a forward defensive stroke, opening the face and running it to backward point
good length on off, he's back and punching to cover
fuller on off, he presses forward to defend
skips down the track and drives to cover
shorter length, he's back and cracking this to the sweeper at deep cover-point
tossed up, he jumps down and clips this firmly to long on
quicker and drifting into middle, he pushes this inside out through cover-point
leg break on off, he steps forward and defends
full toss, he skips out and lofts this easily high down the ground! Got the full toss he wanted, mid off is up, he lofted it almost with one hand but hit it well to clear the rope
tossed up on off, he defends into the off side
flatter and straighter, he works this to midwicket
yorker length, he jams this out back to the bowler
straighter on leg stump, he works this through square midwicket to the sweeper
shorter length, he's back and punching this down to long on
looped up on leg, he nudges this into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off, he drives elegantly inside out through cover-point to the sweeper
tossed up on off, he steps forward and defends
straighter on middle and leg, he sweeps hard but straight to deep backward square
a hint of turn, he's back and trying to cut but slices this to short third man
leg break, looped up outside off, he is off balance mistimes a drive back to the bowler
he reaches outside off, paddle sweeps nicely fine, sprints hard for two and dives head long to make his ground easily
he sweeps again from off stump, hammering it between fine leg and deep square, picking the gap for two
drifting down leg, he shapes to sweep but it's too far down and called wide
fired down the leg side and Carey can't glove it cleanly and they run an extra
pushed through on off, he hangs back and punches to the gap at cover-point
86kph, leg break that slides on, he's back and chopping a cut shot to point
fuller on off, he defends with soft hands into the gap at cover-point
he advances and launches this up and over mid off! Superb footwork. He wasn't quite to the pitch but he was confident enough to hit powerfully through the line
flatter on off, he dabs this to short third man

caught at mid off! Brilliant catch from Lyon! And brilliant bowling and captaincy! He'd gone once in the over already but they didn't send mid off back. He skipped down and tried to go over mid off again, got this off the toe of the bat, struck it well but not enough elevation, Lyon jumps high to his right on the circle and hauls in a superb catch!
darted in to leg, he turns this to midwicket
fuller on leg, he drives down to long on
drifting into off stump, he drives back to the bowler
leg break, good length, sliding on, he's back and jamming the bat down to get a thick inside edge
shorter length, he's back and punching down to long off
shorter length on leg, he's back and whipping this to deep square
shorter leg break, he's back and pulling hard to deep long on
tossed up, he skips down and lofts this beautifully over mid off! He picked the googly straight away, got down the track and lofted it with control over the man in the circle
fuller on leg, he drives down to long on
darted in quicker, he's back and punching firmly to deep cover-point
tossed up on middle, he works this to midwicket
shorter length on leg, he's back and tucking this behind square
round arm fired into off, he's back and punching this to deep cover-point
full and drifting away, he pushes away from his body getting a slight leading edge to mid off
full on leg, he whips firmly to deep midwicket and calls for two but Behrendorff races around to cut it off
leg break on leg, he pushes down long on
tossed up on off, he drives firmly to long on
flatter and quicker, he is forced to defend off the back foot
googly, on leg, he's back and working this through forward square
fuller on off, he's back and defending
edged and it races fine to third man! Well bowled. It was a tossed up leg break, he gets an edge driving and it flies away
he skips down and lofts this drive beautifully up and over mid off! That's a lovely shot
darted in at middle, he pushes back to the bowler
tossed up, he dabs this with soft hands into the off side for one
shorter and he works this off his pads neatly through midwicket
shorter length, he's back and defending this into the off side and they pinch one
fired through and he gets a thick inside edge that flies through forward square
94kph, pushed through on leg, he defends from the crease, surprised a touch by how that slid on
fuller on middle, he hands back and defends
tossed up on middle, he's back and forcing this through point to the sweeper in the deep
pushed through outside off, he is back and dabbing this behind point
pushed through on middle, he's back and defending back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back again and forcing this out through cover-point to the sweeper
fuller on leg, he drives neatly down to long on
126kph, fuller on middle, he defends on the front foot dragging it to midwicket
123kph, short ball, rib high, he pulls around the corner getting it to fine leg
shorter length, on the hip, he rides the bounce and works it behind square
127kph, back of a length, wide of off, he is up on his toes punching off the back foot to mid off
127kph, short ball, shoulder high this time, he swivels on a pull shot and gets it down to fine with control
he's back and working this with the spin through square leg
he charges out to a shorter length, has to adjust and punches on the up to cover
skips down the track to the pitch and drives nicely along the ground to long on
drifting across from around the wicket, he's back and dabbing this to short third man on the circle
tossed up, he drives back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back and chipping this in the air but safely towards long on
short on the hip, he's back and tucking this behind square into the gap for a couple
128kph, good length, he sits back and opens the face and angles this behind point for a singl
he advances and checks a drive to long on
slower ball bouncer, 116kph, he ducks underneath it, it doesn't bounce very high but passes by harmlessly
good length on off, he stands tall and punches back to the bowler
he upper cuts up and over short third man! Nice improvisation. It was short and wide and Haris knew third man was up and he deliberately went up and over with the cut shot. He moves to 98
tossed up outside off, he pushes on the front foot wide of cover for a single
drifting into the pads and he just tucks this neatly to the gap at square leg but only gets one
tossed up outside off, with soft hands he pushes this to cover-point
drifting into leg, he steps forward and defends

drifting into leg, he turns this behind square, he'll come back for two and celebrate a well deserved century! It is Haris' second of the series and second in ODI cricket. He has played with great control and composure.
shorter length, he's back and cutting to point, the man on the circle makes a diving save but they get one
125kph, bouncer, he ducks underneath it with ease
back of a length on off stump, he gives room and cuts hard to deep point
he charges down to a short ball and cracks a flat batted pull shot hard but straight to wide long on, Behrendorff makes a good stop
smoked over midwicket! It was a slower bouncer, Haris sat back and waited and cashed in. He hammered over midwicket to pick the gap in the deep
another slower bouncer, but much higher, he controls a pull shot rolling the wrists to get it through square leg
short slower ball again, again Akmal skips down the track and adjusts on the run, pulling this to fine leg
89kph shorter leg break on middle, he's back and working it to midwicket
shorter length on off, he's skipping down and punching this to long off
tossed up, he skips down and drives to long off
looped up very full, he drives firmly towards long off and takes one, Lyon races across from cover to make a sliding save
launches this way back over long off! He skipped down the track and got the googly in the slot, he launched to through the line and hit it way back over long off
he skips out, this is flatter and he's forced to adjust, defending towards cover
shorter length outside off, he's back and punching this through point to the sweeper
darted into leg, he's working this with the turn through forward square
flatter on leg, he's back and trying to force to long on but can't beat Maxwell
shorter length, he's back and punching this to long off
drifting across the right-hander, he defends off the outside half of the bat
he jumps down the track and drives firmly to long on
full toss and he cracks a drive through cover! Great hands from Akmal to manipulate that past the man at cover with power
drifting into leg, he tucks this through square leg
leg break outside leg, following Haris as he backed away, he whips this to deep forward square
he skips down, is not quite there, he drives on the up to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and flicking this in the air but safely out to deep square leg

almost caught at midwicket! It was just wide of the flying Maxwell. It was a full toss, he punched it in the air towards long on, Maxwell anticipated at midwicket and flew across to his right but it was just out of reach
pushed firmly back at the bowler
flicked off the pads and into the leg side for a single
eased down to long on to turn the strike back over
punched down the ground, one more
Umar backs away, exposing his stumps and chopping the ball out towards the deep cover boundary
Umar sets himself for a mow over long on, but the ball rushes across him and is sliced high over point, landing in no-man's land in the deep
Haris searches for the gap behind point, but he can't quite find it
Richardson comes around the stumps, bursting a length delivery past Haris' outside edge. The batsman is annoyed with himself for not putting this away as there was width on offer
there's the gap he was looking for, Haris waiting deep in the crease and purposefully slicing the ball behind point, having cleared his front leg
nice follow-up from Richardson, sending down a yorker that Haris hurries to dig out
in the air, but safe! Richardson digs it in and Haris splices a pull tamely over mid on, who can't get back quickly enough to make anything of it
nicely played by Umar, who spots a full ball and lifts it cleanly over mid off. He didn't over hit it, or lose his shape as he played the shot
and there's the hundred stand, Haris jumping out to drive inside out over cover
again Umar backs away, placing the ball into the gap between point and short third man
Haris comes forward to drive out to the cover sweeper

caught in the deep! The century stand has just been raised, but now it's broken. Umar jumps down the track and slices underneath an attempted loft down the ground. He got height on the shot, but not enough distance, Behrendorff holding a regulation high chance at long on
Haris turns the strike over with an uppish drive through cover point, the ball landing safely
flighted delivery for the new bat, and he's forward to defend it
tucked into the leg side, with the angle, but he can't find the gap

the century-maker falls! Haris was searching for a boundary, and he though he had one when Richardson offered a short, wide ball outside off. Haris tried to uppercut it over point, but succeeded only in spooning a catch to Lyon at backward point. He didn't get the pace on the ball he was looking for, it was a slower one from Richardson
Imad drives to cover, and there's a slight misfield, allowing a single
a length delivery, just outside off, is dabbed to point
punched out to the cover sweeper for a single, and he'll keep the strike
a late cut finds short third man, and there's no run to be had
tip and run single, into the covers
full, and it's driven down the ground for a single
Saad cuts, but finds point
Saad makes a little room, and cuts again - but once more he finds the point fielder
chopped hard into the cover
pulled hard, but there's protection at deep midwicket
Imad is forward to drive, but finds cover
beaten on the cut by one that rushes straight on off the track
Imad waits in his crease, pushing the ball into the covers
nudged off the pads, but it's just a single out to midwicket
Imad slaps a length ball straight back down the track at Behrendorff, who gets a hand on the ball and deflects it back towards the non-striker's stumps - but past them
slashed out through cover point
slammed over long off, Imad finally getting hold of one. Imad cleared his leg, cracking the stroke cleanly over the boundary. Pakistan need a few more of those
Behrendorff follows that up with a slower cutter which dribbles under the bat outside off
straighter this time, and it's worked down to long on for one

picked up over the leg side, but straight at the fielder in the deep! Pakistan slide a little further. The shot was on, as a full length ball was sliding in to him with the angle, but Saad just couldn't get the distance he was looking for. Marsh waits for it at deep midwicket, and holds it with a reverse cup
speared down the leg side from Zampa, and he'll have to bowl that one again
that's better from Zampa, aiming outside off and beating Yasir's outside edge
Yasir waits in his crease and forces this one away through the covers to get off the mark
Imad heaves into the leg side, muscling the ball with the spin and finding the gap between long on and deep midwicket
rifled down the ground! Imad is striking them cleanly, and clears his left leg to power a full one past mid off and away for four
slammed down the ground again, but this one isn't placed as well so it's only a single
Yasir waits on the back foot to find a single through the covers

full, and it's dug out into the leg side, where Finch fields and has a shy at the stumps. He misses, and fortunately Marsh is alert and backing up. Had he not been in position, it would have been four overthrows
a big heave is bottom edged into the leg side, and they're through for a single
slower ball from Richardson, and it has the beating of Imad outside off
change of pace once again from Richardson, and Imad can only hack this back of a length delivery into the covers
full pace delivery this time, and it's powered through point! Richardson offered him width, and Imad cashed in
just short of a good length again, and it's pulled into the leg side with no great timing
whipped off a length and out into the leg side. Imad wants two, calls for two, and is back for the second to keep the strike

inside edge brings four! Behrendorff aimed this one full and Imad had a full go at it, only for a thick inside edge to send the ball bouncing past the stumps and the wicketkeeper and down to the boundary

short from Behrendorff, and it's pulled down to fine leg, where Lyon puts in some excellent work at the boundary's edge, getting to the ball in a flash and releasing it immediately to keep them to one
on a length and straight, Yasir swinging wildly to get the ball down to long on
another big swipe from Yasir, the ball dribbling in to the leg side as they pinch a quick single

slashed down to third man! The fielder was up at short third man, so Imad just had to get it past him. Behrendorff helped by bowling it short of a good length, outside off, and though the shot was little more than a thick edge it's brought a vital boundary

Yasir slams a length ball straight back at Richardson, who fields off his own bowling. Imad had wandered way out of his crease, looking to get back on strike, but Richardson decides not to throw down the stumps! He had time, and all three to aim at
slower ball, and Imad swipes at it one-handed as he's flummoxed by the change of pace. The ball rolls into the leg side field, and they take a single
full bunger from Richardson, and it's sliced out towards the cover sweeper ... but drops short of him!
another slower one at 118km/h, Imad backing away and slashing it down to long off
on a length and straight, Imad slugging it down to long on and running through for a single to keep the strike

sliced to wide long off! Imad clears his leg at a short one on off stump, slicing the ball wide of Richardson at long off. Richardson hared around the boundary to get to it, but his dive wasn't enough
crunched out to the cover sweeper, just the one
Yasir spots a length ball and spanks it straight, but doesn't hit it well enough to reach the boundary. That does, however, bring up Pakistan's 300
slower ball bouncer, and Yasir gets himself in an awful tangle trying to get it away. In the end, he taps it tamely to short fine leg, and they sprint through for one
dug in by Behrendorff, but it's much too short and balloons way over the batsman
a slow cutter, just 112km/h, and Imad slams it out to the cover sweeper

caught at long on! Yasir had to go for it. The ball was full, slow and in the arc. He aimed for the stands beyond long on, but could only get it as far as Finch, who was lurking near the boundary in that direction
swatted off a length and out to the cover sweeper, and they take on the fielder to get back for the second
slower ball from Richardson, Imad throwing the kitchen sink at it but he's through the stroke far too early
too short, too wide, and he'll have to bowl this one again
full pace delivery, just short of a length, and Imad plays and misses outside off
on a length and straighter this time, Imad pushing it back to the bowler

Imad sets himself for a big hit into the leg side, but the ball takes the inside edge and bounces off his pad. It rolls into space, and he's called through for a single to take him to fifty. With the game lost, there's no celebration from him
and Shinwari swipes over the top of a slower ball on a length outside off to end the game
